segment.phrase: Njomba za mchemwali
Mina anadzuka mochedwa tsiku lina. Mchemwali wake, Thandi, panalibe pabedi. “Wapita kuti?” anatero Mina. “Bwanji sanandidzutse?”
Mina anawafunsa mayi. “Thandi ali kuti?”
“Ali mukhitchini,” anatero mayi. “Akudya chakudya.”
Koma Thandi sanali kukhitchini. Kunali chinachake mmalo mwake. Chinali chachikulu. Chimamwa mkaka kugwiritsa ntchito kapaipi ndi kudya chipatso.
“Ameneyo si mchemwali wanga!” anakuwa Mina. “Ndi mvuwu! Ikuchita chiyani mukhitchini?”
“Bambo, mukudziwa komwe kuli Thandi?” anafunsa Mina.
“Ali panja,” anatero bambo. “Akusambira mudamu.”
Koma Mina atatuluka panja, sanamuone Thandi mudamu. Panali chinachake mmalo mwake. Chinakhazikika m’madzi ndi kumamwetulira.
“Ameneyo si mchemwali wanga!” anakuwa Mina. “Ndi mvuwu! Ikutani mudamu?”
Mina anafufuza panja. Anayang’ana kutali kugwiritsa ntchito telesikopu. Anayang’ana m’tauni ndi m’mapiri. Sanamuone mchemwali wake paliponse.
“Mwamuonako mchemwali wanga?” Mina anafunsa aneba.
“Inde,” anatero aneba. “Thandi ali kosewelera.”
Koma Mina atapita kosewelera, sanamuone Thandi kumeneko. Kunali chinachake kumeneko. Chinakhala pasiso. Chimafuna kusewera.
“Ameneyo si mchemwali wanga!” anakuwa Mina. “Ndi mvuwu imeneyo!”
Koma anasewerabe pasiso. Ndipo mvuwu ija inaseka.
“Aah!” anatero Mina. “Kuseka uku ndikukudziwa!”
Anaigirigisha mvuwu ija. Mvuwu ija inasekanso.
“Sindiwe mvuwu!” anaseka Mina. Ndipo mwadzidzidzi, Thandi anatuluka kuchokera mkamwa mwa mvuwu ija. Koma siinali mvuwu yeniyeni. Chinali chovala chabe!
“Wandipeza!” Thandi anaseka, ndipo atsikanawo anapitira limodzi kunyumba.
“Ulendo wina,” anatero Mina, akumwetulira. “Ndidzakusewera njomba!”
